attributes.additional_details: Carer is a full time job we need to be noticed and treated fairly
attributes.background: Carers are under paid £64.70 a week we need to be treated fairly for all our work we do personal assistants,support workers get a paid living wage for their work not carers. Carers live in proverty and have to fight to obtain every provision their loved ones are entitled to but are being denied

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to ensure fairness in this area. Alternatively, you may wish to sign an existing petition that deals with this issue, for example: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234864
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233666
